N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 590.11 - Special treatment procedures

State Regulations
(a) No
comprehensive psychiatric emergency program shall use restraint or seclusion
without a written plan for the use of restraint or seclusion, as defined in
section 590.4 of this Part, which is in accordance with section 526.4 of this

Title. (b) No comprehensive
psychiatric emergency program shall use extraordinary risk procedures. Extraordinary risk procedures include, but are not limited to, experimental
treatment modalities and aversive conditioning. (c) No comprehensive psychiatric emergency
program shall use electroconvulsive therapy. Notes
